system.description:
An animal is a living, nonhuman creature, usually a vertebrate with no magical abilities and no innate capacity for language or culture.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good Fortitude and Reflex saves.

Traits: Animals eat, sleep, and breathe; proficient with natural weapons only; always neutral alignment; low-light vision; Intelligence score of 1 or 2 (no creature with Intelligence 3 or higher can be an animal).
